attributes.action: Stop 'drones' over our country for safety reasons.
attributes.additional_details:
We need full control on these small Drones on two reasons, first Privacy in properties and children.

The other more one is the use by anybody wishing to Kill by the fitting of Bombs to them, these could be used by 'I S' to cause deaths by these people.

They can be purchased for around £300 and I guess larger ones which could carry fairly large bombs.

These need stopping on public safety and common sense with these wanting to kill as many as possible.

Please support this before it happens.

Thanks
